mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO , VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, RQST_DCD , PDM_REL_ID, PDM_REL_LNM, PDM_REL_PNM , REL_TYP_CD, CRD_TYP_CD , PA_OPT_TYP_CD , PA_SUBJ_ID, PA_FULL_PATH, PA_TBL_ID, PA_TBL_PNM , CH_SUBJ_ID, CH_FULL_PATH, CH_TBL_ID, CH_TBL_PNM , OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID

A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO , A.RQST_DTL_SNO , A.PDM_REL_ID , A.PDM_REL_PNM, A.PDM_REL_LNM , A.VRF_CD , A.VRF_RMK , NVL(A.RVW_STS_CD,'0') AS RVW_STS_CD , A.RVW_CONTS , A.RQST_DCD , A.REL_TYP_CD , A.CRD_TYP_CD , A.PA_OPT_TYP_CD , A.PA_SUBJ_ID, A.PA_FULL_PATH, A.PA_TBL_ID, A.PA_TBL_PNM , A.CH_SUBJ_ID, A.CH_FULL_PATH, A.CH_TBL_ID, A.CH_TBL_PNM , A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID
mapper.insert: insert into WAQ_PDM_REL_MST (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, PDM_REL_PNM, PA_TBL_PNM, PA_COL_PNM, CH_TBL_PNM, CH_COL_PNM, PDM_REL_ID, PDM_REL_LNM, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, RQST_DCD, REL_TYP_CD, CRD_TYP_CD, PA_OPT_TYP_CD, PA_SUBJ_ID, PA_FULL_PATH, PA_TBL_ID, PA_COL_ID, CH_SUBJ_ID, CH_FULL_PATH, CH_TBL_ID, CH_COL_ID, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID ) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pdmRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdmRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdmRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paFullPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chFullPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_DTL_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_MST WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
INSERT INTO WAQ_PDM_REL_MST
RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO,
PDM_REL_PNM,
PA_TBL_PNM,
CH_TBL_PNM,
PDM_REL_ID,
PDM_REL_LNM,
VRF_CD,
VRF_RMK,
RQST_DCD,
REL_TYP_CD,
CRD_TYP_CD,
PA_OPT_TYP_CD,
PA_SUBJ_ID,
PA_FULL_PATH,
PA_TBL_ID,
CH_SUBJ_ID,
CH_FULL_PATH,
CH_TBL_ID,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{pdmRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pdmRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pdmRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paFullPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chFullPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
1,
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSDATETIME, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATETIME,
#{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update WAQ_PDM_REL_MST
PDM_REL_ID = #{pdmRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PDM_REL_LNM = #{pdmRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REL_TYP_CD = #{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRD_TYP_CD = #{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_OPT_TYP_CD = #{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_SUBJ_ID = #{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_FULL_PATH = #{paFullPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_TBL_ID = #{paTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_SUBJ_ID = #{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_FULL_PATH = #{chFullPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_TBL_ID = #{chTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PDM_REL_PNM = #{pdmRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_TBL_PNM = #{paTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_TBL_PNM = #{chTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WAQ_PDM_REL_MST set PDM_REL_ID = #{pdmRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDM_REL_LNM = #{pdmRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REL_TYP_CD = #{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRD_TYP_CD = #{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_OPT_TYP_CD = #{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_SUBJ_ID = #{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_FULL_PATH = #{paFullPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_TBL_ID = #{paTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_COL_ID = #{paAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CH_SUBJ_ID = #{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CH_FULL_PATH = #{chFullPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CH_TBL_ID = #{chTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CH_COL_ID = #{chAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and PDM_REL_PNM = #{pdmRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_TBL_PNM = #{paTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_COL_PNM = #{paAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_TBL_PNM = #{chTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_COL_PNM = #{chAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE WAQ_PDM_REL_MST A SET (A.REG_TYP_CD, A.PDM_REL_ID) = (SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.PDM_REL_PNM) IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END , MAX(B.PDM_REL_ID) FROM WAM_PDM_REL_MST B WHERE B.PDM_REL_PNM = A.PDM_REL_PNM AND B.PA_FULL_PATH = A.PA_FULL_PATH AND B.PA_TBL_PNM = A.PA_TBL_PNM ) , A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE WAQ_PDM_REL_MST A SET (A.PA_SUBJ_ID, A.CH_SUBJ_ID) = (select B.SUBJ_ID, C.SUBJ_ID from WAA_SUBJ B INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ C ON 1=1 AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') where B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.FULL_PATH = A.PA_FULL_PATH AND C.FULL_PATH = A.CH_FULL_PATH ) ,A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 : 부모엔터티 주제영역명 미존재 (PR001) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.PA_SUBJ_ID IS NULL

--검증쿼리 : 부모엔터티명 미존재 (PR002) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL D INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ E ON E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND E.SUBJ_ID = D.SUBJ_ID WHERE E.FULL_PATH = A.PA_FULL_PATH AND D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.PA_TBL_PNM )
--검증쿼리 : 자식엔터티 주제영역명 미존재 (PR004) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.CH_SUBJ_ID IS NULL

--검증쿼리 : 자식엔터티명 미존재 (PR005) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL D INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ E ON E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.SUBJ_ID = D.SUBJ_ID WHERE E.FULL_PATH = A.CH_FULL_PATH AND D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.CH_TBL_PNM )

--검증쿼리 : 관계명 내용 불일치 (PR007) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_MST D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO AND ( D.PDM_REL_LNM != A.PDM_REL_LNM OR D.CRD_TYP_CD != A.CRD_TYP_CD OR D.REL_TYP_CD != A.REL_TYP_CD OR D.PA_OPT_TYP_CD != A.PA_OPT_TYP_CD )
)

--검증쿼리 : 삭제대상 미존재 관계 (PR009) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_REL_MST D WHERE D.PDM_REL_PNM = A.PDM_REL_PNM AND D.PA_FULL_PATH = A.PA_FULL_PATH AND D.PA_TBL_PNM = A.PA_TBL_PNM )

--검증쿼리 : 요청중인 관계(요청중인 관계일 경우 전체 적용...) (PR010) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR B INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_REL_MST C ON C.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND NVL(C.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' WHERE B.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND B.RQST_NO != A.RQST_NO AND C.PDM_REL_PNM = A.PDM_REL_PNM AND C.PA_FULL_PATH = A.PA_FULL_PATH AND C.PA_TBL_PNM = A.PA_TBL_PNM )

--검증쿼리 : 부모, 자식엔터티중 하나는 테이블명과 일치해야함 (PR008) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND ( D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.PA_TBL_PNM OR D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.CH_TBL_PNM )
)

--검증쿼리 : 중복 관계명 (부모, 자식내용까지) 동일한 관계 검출(PR011)
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_MST D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO != D.RQST_DTL_SNO AND A.PDM_REL_PNM = D.PDM_REL_PNM AND A.PA_FULL_PATH = D.PA_FULL_PATH AND A.PA_TBL_PNM = D.PA_TBL_PNM )

--검증쿼리 : 변경사항 없을경우 (PR000) AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_REL_MST D WHERE D.PDM_REL_PNM = A.PDM_REL_PNM AND D.PA_FULL_PATH = A.PA_FULL_PATH AND D.PA_TBL_PNM = A.PA_TBL_PNM AND NVL(D.PDM_REL_LNM, '_') = NVL(A.PDM_REL_LNM, '_') AND NVL(D.CH_TBL_PNM,'_') = NVL(A.CH_TBL_PNM,'_') AND NVL(D.REL_TYP_CD, '_') = NVL(A.REL_TYP_CD, '_') AND NVL(D.CRD_TYP_CD, '_') = NVL(A.CRD_TYP_CD, '_') AND NVL(D.PA_OPT_TYP_CD, '_') = NVL(A.PA_OPT_TYP_CD, '_') AND NVL(D.OBJ_DESCN, '_') = NVL(A.OBJ_DESCN, '_') ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_COL X WHERE X.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND X.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND X.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO AND X.VRF_CD IN ('1','2') )
--검증쿼리 : 컬럼 오류가 있을 경우 체크 (PR999) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_COL D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO = D.RQST_DTL_SNO AND D.VRF_CD = '2' )
mapper.select: --신규 적재 대상 추출 SELECT A.* FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_MST A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: --WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_PDM_REL_MST A SET (PDM_REL_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.PDM_REL_ID , NVL(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_PDM_REL_MST B WHERE B.PDM_REL_PNM = A.PDM_REL_PNM AND B.PA_FULL_PATH = A.PA_FULL_PATH AND B.PA_TBL_PNM = A.PA_TBL_PNM ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_REL_MST B WHERE B.PDM_REL_PNM = A.PDM_REL_PNM AND B.PA_FULL_PATH = A.PA_FULL_PATH AND B.PA_TBL_PNM = A.PA_TBL_PNM )

--주제영역 ID, 테이블 ID 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_PDM_REL_MST X SET (PA_SUBJ_ID, PA_TBL_ID) = (SELECT A.SUBJ_ID, A.PDM_TBL_ID FROM WAM_PDM_TBL A WHERE A.FULL_PATH = X.PA_FULL_PATH AND A.PDM_TBL_PNM = X.PA_TBL_PNM ) , (CH_SUBJ_ID, CH_TBL_ID) = (SELECT A.SUBJ_ID, A.PDM_TBL_ID FROM WAM_PDM_TBL A WHERE A.FULL_PATH = X.CH_FULL_PATH AND A.PDM_TBL_PNM = X.CH_TBL_PNM ) WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND X.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능
mapper.sql: PDM_REL_PNM , PDM_REL_LNM , REL_TYP_CD , CRD_TYP_CD , PA_OPT_TYP_CD , PA_SUBJ_ID , PA_FULL_PATH , PA_TBL_ID , PA_TBL_PNM , CH_SUBJ_ID , CH_FULL_PATH , CH_TBL_ID , CH_TBL_PNM , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM , RQST_USER_ID , APRV_DTM , APRV_USER_ID
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_PDM_REL_MST A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_MST B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.PDM_REL_ID = A.PDM_REL_ID AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.VRF_CD = '1' )
mapper.insert: --WAM 추가 (WAQ 내용을 추가, REG_TYP_CD 가 신규,변경일 경우) INSERT INTO WAM_PDM_REL_MST ( PDM_REL_ID , ) SELECT A.PDM_REL_ID , FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_MST A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_PDM_REL_MST A SET EXP_DTM = SYSDATETIME WHERE EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_MST C WHERE C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND C.PDM_REL_ID = A.PDM_REL_ID AND C.VRF_CD = '1' AND C.RVW_STS_CD = '1' )
mapper.insert: --WAH이력 적재... INSERT INTO WAH_PDM_REL_MST ( PDM_REL_ID , EXP_DTM , STR_DTM , ) SELECT A.PDM_REL_ID , TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DTM , SYSDATETIME AS STR_DTM , FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_MST A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1'

--테이블 추가시 WAM에 존재하는 컬럼 추가한다. INSERT INTO WAQ_PDM_REL_COL ( RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO , PDM_REL_COL_ID , PDM_REL_ID, PDM_REL_PNM, PDM_REL_LNM , RQST_DCD , PA_SUBJ_ID, PA_FULL_PATH , PA_TBL_ID, PA_TBL_PNM , PA_COL_ID, PA_COL_PNM , CH_SUBJ_ID, CH_FULL_PATH , CH_TBL_ID, CH_TBL_PNM , CH_COL_ID, CH_COL_PNM , OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID ) SELECT B.RQST_NO , B.RQST_SNO , B.RQST_DTL_SNO , (SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_COL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno} AND RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno} ) + ROWNUM AS RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO , C.PDM_REL_COL_ID , A.PDM_REL_ID , A.PDM_REL_PNM , A.PDM_REL_LNM , 'CU' AS RQST_DCD , C.PA_SUBJ_ID, C.PA_FULL_PATH , C.PA_TBL_ID, C.PA_TBL_PNM , C.PA_COL_ID, C.PA_COL_PNM , C.CH_SUBJ_ID, C.CH_FULL_PATH , C.CH_TBL_ID, C.CH_TBL_PNM , C.CH_COL_ID, C.CH_COL_PNM , C.OBJ_DESCN, C.OBJ_VERS, C.FRS_RQST_DTM, C.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_PDM_REL_MST A INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_REL_MST B ON B.PDM_REL_ID = B.PDM_REL_ID INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_REL_COL C ON C.PDM_REL_ID = A.PDM_REL_ID WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno} AND B.RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_SNO),0) + 1 AS RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_MST WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

--물리관계 테이블 추가대상 조회... SELECT 'I' AS IBS_STATUS , A.PDM_REL_ID , A.PDM_REL_PNM , A.PDM_REL_LNM , #{reqmst.rqstDcd} AS RQST_DCD , A.REL_TYP_CD , A.CRD_TYP_CD , A.PA_OPT_TYP_CD , A.PA_SUBJ_ID, A.PA_FULL_PATH, A.PA_TBL_ID, A.PA_TBL_PNM , A.CH_SUBJ_ID, A.CH_FULL_PATH, A.CH_TBL_ID, A.CH_TBL_PNM , A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID FROM WAM_PDM_REL_MST A WHERE A.PDM_REL_ID IN
#{item.pdmRelId}
